dmca.title: DCMA complaint
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Francis [mailto:francis@vanbeveren.eu] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 11, 2006 12:09 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: DCMA complaint
Subject: DCMA complaint


Hi,
 
The website http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/
<http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/index.php>  is an copy of my
website http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu. This is the second or third
time that he placed my website on his server.
 
This is my DCMA complaint. 
 
Identification of the copyrighted work:: 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/i/2/spelletjescentrumeu-bk.gif 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/i/2/spelletjescentrumeu-hd.gif 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/i/2/spelletjescentrumeu-cat.gif 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/i/2/spelletjescentrumeu-menu.gif 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/i/2/spelletjescentrumeu-smn.gif 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/i/2/spelletjescentrumeu-maint.gif 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/i/2/spelletjescentrumeu-ft.gif 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/spel.php 
http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/avonturenspellen.php 
http://www.spelletjescentrm.eu/s2.css 
 
 
Specific links to pages/files which are infringing (some samples): 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/index.php 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/i/2/flashgamewebbk.gif 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/i/2/flashgamewebhd.gif 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/i/2/flashgamewebcat.gif 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/i/2/flashgamewebmenu.gif 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/i/2/flashgamewebsmn.gif 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/i/2/flashgamewebmaint.gif 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/i/2/flashgamewebft.gif 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/game.php
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/adventure-games.php 
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/s2.css 
 
 
My contact information: 
F.C.A. van Beveren 
Stadsmolen 22 
3146 CC Maassluis 
Netherlands 
email: francis@vanbeveren.eu 
Telephone: +31 (0)6 4221 0945 
 
I, F.C.A. van Beveren, the complaining party has a goof faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized
by me, the copyright owner. 
 
I, F.C.A. van Beveren, make a statement that the information in the
notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the
complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 
 
 
Regards, 
Francis van Beveren 
francis@vanbeveren.eu
